escalate: ESC expired codes/discount code issues, ask for cart ID and add it in esc notes
Don't send to CS for this client, ESC if needed
For retroactive discount requests add discount % in ESC note
ESC if a customer requests a different resolution, after their escalation was resolved
dos_and_don_ts: Fun Bucks AREN'T rewards points, those are given during exchanges
promo_and_promo_exclusions: This brand does not use coupon codes or promotions. All of their discounts are exclusively link-based and are applied automatically to the shopping cart upon checkout when the appropriate conditions are met
Please do not advise customers to use promotional codes, do not provide them with any codes, and do not direct them to look on the website for additional codes
They do not have any promotional code text fields on site to facilitate use

templates: For custom full vehicle covers use FVC shortcut
For cx that can't see the cover pattern/images of their vehicle use CPI shortcut
If we don't have a pattern/color the cx is looking for use PRR shortcut
dos_and_don_ts: Do not tell customers that the base price is the final price! The cost changes by the fitment and depends on the vehicle
Rebates are discounts for this brand!
Custom dim pattern sheets are only available for Vehicle Covers (Car, Truck, Van,RV)
